notes: "Teaching Dutch in primary and secondary education: a video collection" is a collection of approx. 80 hours of filmed lessons in Dutch and Flemish primary and secondary schools. The lessons were collected in a searchable database and they were enriched with metadata and annotations.
title: Teaching Dutch in primary and secondary education: a video collection
